TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PasswordBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
Public NotInheritable Class PasswordBox Inherits Control
public ref class PasswordBox sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Control

summary.span: 表示設計用來輸入與處理密碼的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control designed for entering and handling passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有內建處理事件反昇和事件。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，自訂事件處理常式，接聽`MouseUp`或是`MouseDown`事件`PasswordBox`絕不會呼叫。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for `MouseUp` or `MouseDown` events from a `PasswordBox` will never be called. 如果您需要回應這些事件，通道接聽並事件相反的或註冊處理常式與（後面這個選項才可透過程式碼） 的引數。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不會將事件處理，除非您刻意想要停用標記原生處理這些事件，並注意這其中有顯著的效果，在控制項上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## 自訂 PasswordBox 控制項Customizing the PasswordBox Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [PasswordBox 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/passwordbox-syles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [PasswordBox Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/passwordbox-syles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性將才有作用如果該屬性會同時出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，而且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定的處理常式方法事件。The following example shows how to specify the handler method for the event. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下列範例會顯示對應的事件處理常式。The following example shows the corresponding event handler. 在此情況下，事件處理常式只會遞增計數器。In this case, the event handler simply increments a counter. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwbox_pwchanged)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwbox_pwchanged)]

summary.span: 取得或設定筆刷，這個筆刷指定密碼方塊的插入號色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush that specifies the color of the password box's caret.

value.span: 筆刷，描述密碼方塊的插入號色彩。

span.span: A brush that describes the color of the password box's caret.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性來指定其插入號色彩。You can set the property of a to specify the color of its caret. 例如，您可以設定是相同的值屬性。For example, you can set to be the same value as the property. 表示的色彩中的字元。 indicates the color of the characters in the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定和為紅色。The following example creates a and sets the and to red. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Caretbrush 設定為紅色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxcaretbrush.png "PasswordBox caretbrush 設定為紅色。")![PasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red.](~/add/media/passwordboxcaretbrush.png "PasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red.") summary.span: 取得或設定要由這個 處理的密碼最大長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length for passwords to be handled by this .

value.span: 指定要由這個 處理之密碼最大長度的整數 (以字元為單位)。

span.span: An integer specifying the maximum length, in characters, for passwords to be handled by this .

value.span: 值為零 (**0**) 表示沒有限制。

span.span: A value of zero (**0**) means no limit.

value.span: 預設值是**0** （沒有長度限制）。

span.span: The default value is **0** (no length limit).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會限制使用者，以手動方式輸入的密碼其不會影響以程式設計方式管理屬性。This property only restricts passwords entered manually by the user; it has no effect on programmatic manipulation of the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_MaxLen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_maxlen)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_MaxLen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_maxlen)]

member this.Password : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前由 保留的密碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the password currently held by the .

value.span: 表示目前由 保留的密碼字串。

span.span: A string representing the password currently held by the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您進入屬性值，以在記憶體中的純文字公開密碼。When you get the property value, you expose the password as plain text in memory. 若要避免此潛在的安全性風險，請使用屬性來取得做為密碼。To avoid this potential security risk, use the property to get the password as a . 將此屬性設定為`null`會導致基礎的密碼設為。Setting this property to `null` causes the underlying password to be set to . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Pwd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_pwd)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Pwd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_pwd)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char PasswordChar { char get(); void set(char value); };
member this.PasswordChar : char with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 的遮罩字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the masking character for the .

value.span: 當使用者輸入文字至 時，會以遮罩字元回應。

span.span: A masking character to echo when the user enters text into the .

value.span: 預設值是項目符號字元 (**●**)。

span.span: The default value is a bullet character (**●**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字輸入時，這個屬性所指定的遮罩字元會重複在密碼輸入的欄位中，而不是實際的密碼本身。When text is entered into a , the masking character specified by this property is echoed in the password input field, rather than the actual password itself. 這有助於防止密碼時輸入它們的公開給隨意的觀察者。This helps prevent passwords from being exposed to casual observers when they are entered. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_PwdChar](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_pwdchar)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_PwdChar](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_pwdchar)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Paste() cil managed

summary.span: 以 [剪貼簿] 的內容取代 中目前的選取範圍。

span.span: Replaces the current selection in the with the contents of the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會清除的內容之前貼上作業; 它會貼上的內容，以取代目前的選取範圍，或在目前游標位置插入貼上的內容。This method does not clear the contents of the before the paste; it will either replace the current selection with pasted content, or insert the pasted content at the current cursor position. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將內容載入與方法。The following example shows how to paste content into a with the method. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Paste](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_paste)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Paste](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_paste)]

summary.span: 取得或設定會反白顯示所選取文字的筆刷。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush that highlights selected text.

value.span: 會反白顯示所選取文字的筆刷。

span.span: A brush that highlights selected text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定會藉由設定反白顯示選取的文字的筆刷和屬性。You can specify the brush that highlights selected text by setting the and properties. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定屬性設成綠色，屬性為 0.5。The following example creates a and sets the property to green and the property to 0.5. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Selectionbrush 設定為綠色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox selectionbrush 設定為綠色。")![PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.](~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.") remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定為 0，透明，看不到。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果您設定1.0 或更新版本，以是不透明，而且選取文字不是可見。If you set the to 1.0 or greater, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定屬性設成綠色，屬性為 0.5。The following example creates a and sets the property to green and the property to 0.5. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Selectionbrush 設定為綠色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox selectionbrush 設定為綠色。")![PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.](~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.") 使用設為 0.5 SelectionOpacity PasswordBox 中選取的文字Selected text in a PasswordBox with SelectionOpacity set to 0.5
